giveaways.title: Giveaways
giveaways.desc1: Giveaways are a fun thing to do, but can tend to be a difficult thing to manage/give out the keys to user(s). We have helped bridge the gap to make it easier!
giveaways.desc2: To begin, click the command icon in the table on the key you want to give away, or click the button below to get a random key.

list.item1: Add a key/url to your Key Store down below.
list.item2: Generate the command for either a random, or specific giveaway.
list.item3: Run the command in your chat.

item4.c: (Default) or whatever alias you create to enter.

list.item5: When the giveaway expires, a user will be picked.

item6.a: They will have a limited amount of time to claim by typing

list.item7: The key/url will be marked as claimed on your dashboard. Streamer can then coordinate winnings however they prefer.

start.title: Start Giveaway
start.desc1: Select the platform below and your options to start the giveaway.

platform.title: Platform
platform.help: Platform to start the giveaway on.

sub.title: Sub Only
sub.help: Subscribers will only be allowed to join.

discord.title: Discord Channel
discord.help: Make sure users are able to chat in the channel!

start.success: Giveaway has been queued to start. Check your chat to see if it was able to start!
